name: Laserizator
description:
Description :
Shoot the upcoming ennemies spaceships and avoid asteroids to stay alive !
Defend your homeplanet during those repetitive waves and aim for the highest score !
Multiple power-ups are available : Shield, weapon upgrade & rockets. Try to destroy every enemies in a wave !

Commands :

  • To move : Z,Q,S,D / W,A,S,D or arrows
  • To Shoot : Left click or Space
  • To change weapon : Right click or Shift
